metadata.title: CVE-2022-48279 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In ModSecurity before 2.9.6 and 3.x before 3.0.8, HTTP multipart requestswere incorrectly parsed and could bypass the Web Application Firewall.NOTE: this is related to CVE-2022-39956 but can be considered independentchanges to the ModSecurity (C language) codebase.

criterions.comment: modsecurity-apache: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
